functional_jobs.job_statement: When I need to update my information, I want to easily access the update feature, so I can keep my profile current.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Users can update their information through the app.
functional_jobs.pain_points: The process is not obvious, and many users are unaware of how to do it.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A straightforward method for users to update their information on their own.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report that they can easily find and use the update feature without external help.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to join events, I want the process to be intuitive and seamless, so I can participate without frustration.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Users can join events through the website or app.
functional_jobs.pain_points: The current process is convoluted, and information about events is not easily accessible.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A simplified and clear event joining process that provides all necessary information upfront.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report a smooth experience when joining events without confusion or excessive navigation.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I need to keep track of my events, I want a dedicated page that lists all my registered events, so I can manage my schedule easily.
functional_jobs.current_solution: A 'my newcomers' page exists but is not user-friendly.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Users find it challenging to navigate and find their events on the website.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A well-organized and easily accessible list of events that users are registered for.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can quickly find and manage their events in one place without unnecessary clicks.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I use the club's website, I want to feel that it represents a contemporary and vibrant community, so I can feel proud to be a member.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: The current website design is outdated.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Members feel that the website does not reflect the club's modern values or attract new members.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A refreshed and contemporary website design that resonates with members and potential newcomers.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Positive feedback from members regarding the new website design and increased engagement from newcomers.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I am new to the community, I want to feel welcomed and integrated, so I can build connections and feel at home.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: New member orientation and events exist.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Some new members feel lost or unsure about how to get involved.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A welcoming environment that fosters connection among new members.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: New members express feelings of belonging and connection after participating in events.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and active member of the community, so I can build my social network.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulties in joining events may lead to feelings of exclusion.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Increased visibility and acceptance within the community as a proactive member.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Members report feeling more connected and recognized within the community after attending events.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I receive notifications about new events or updates, I want them to be clear and actionable, so I can easily engage with the community.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Notifications are sent through the app.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Many members do not receive or notice notifications, leading to missed opportunities.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Effective communication that ensures all members are informed and can participate in community events.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: High levels of engagement in events following improved notification systems.
